problem_names:
lemma plus_const_cases: "plus_const a1 a2 =
  (case (a1,a2) of (Const m, Const n) \<Rightarrow> Const(m+n) | _ \<Rightarrow> Any)"

lemma measure_const:
  "(strict{(x::const,y). x \<sqsubseteq> y})^-1 \<subseteq> measure m_const"

lemma measure_const_eq:
  "\<forall> x y::const. x \<sqsubseteq> y \<and> y \<sqsubseteq> x \<longrightarrow> m_const x = m_const y"
translations:
lemma plus_const_cases: "plus_const a1 a2 =
  (case (a1,a2) of (Const m, Const n) \<Rightarrow> Const(m+n) | _ \<Rightarrow> Any)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. plus_const a1 a2 =
    (case (a1, a2) of (Const m, Const n) \<Rightarrow> Const (m + n)
     | (Const m, Any) \<Rightarrow> Any | (Any, b) \<Rightarrow> Any)

fun le_const where
"_ \<sqsubseteq> Any = True" |
"Const n \<sqsubseteq> Const m = (n=m)" |
"Any \<sqsubseteq> Const _ = False"

fun join_const where
"Const m \<squnion> Const n = (if n=m then Const m else Any)" |
"_ \<squnion> _ = Any"

global_interpretation Val_abs
where \<gamma> = \<gamma>_const and num' = Const and plus' = plus_const

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Val_abs \<gamma>_const Const plus_const

proof (state)
goal (4 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a b.
       a \<sqsubseteq> b \<Longrightarrow>
       \<gamma>_const a \<subseteq> \<gamma>_const b
 2. \<gamma>_const \<top> = UNIV
 3. \<And>n. n \<in> \<gamma>_const (Const n)
 4. \<And>n1 a1 n2 a2.
       \<lbrakk>n1 \<in> \<gamma>_const a1;
        n2 \<in> \<gamma>_const a2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> n1 + n2 \<in> \<gamma>_const (plus_const a1 a2)

proof (state)
this:
  a \<sqsubseteq> b

goal (4 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a b.
       a \<sqsubseteq> b \<Longrightarrow>
       \<gamma>_const a \<subseteq> \<gamma>_const b
 2. \<gamma>_const \<top> = UNIV
 3. \<And>n. n \<in> \<gamma>_const (Const n)
 4. \<And>n1 a1 n2 a2.
       \<lbrakk>n1 \<in> \<gamma>_const a1;
        n2 \<in> \<gamma>_const a2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> n1 + n2 \<in> \<gamma>_const (plus_const a1 a2)

proof (prove)
using this:
  a \<sqsubseteq> b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<gamma>_const a \<subseteq> \<gamma>_const b
by(cases a, cases b, simp, simp, cases b, simp, simp)

proof (state)
this:
  \<gamma>_const a \<subseteq> \<gamma>_const b

 1. \<gamma>_const \<top> = UNIV

global_interpretation Abs_Int
where \<gamma> = \<gamma>_const and num' = Const and plus' = plus_const
defines AI_const = AI and step_const = step' and aval'_const = aval'

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Abs_Int Const plus_const \<gamma>_const

global_interpretation Abs_Int_mono
where \<gamma> = \<gamma>_const and num' = Const and plus' = plus_const

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Abs_Int_mono Const plus_const \<gamma>_const

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a1 b1 a2 b2.
       \<lbrakk>a1 \<sqsubseteq> b1; a2 \<sqsubseteq> b2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> plus_const a1 a2 \<sqsubseteq> plus_const b1 b2

proof (state)
this:
  a1_ \<sqsubseteq> b1_
  a2_ \<sqsubseteq> b2_

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a1 b1 a2 b2.
       \<lbrakk>a1 \<sqsubseteq> b1; a2 \<sqsubseteq> b2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> plus_const a1 a2 \<sqsubseteq> plus_const b1 b2

proof (prove)
using this:
  a1_ \<sqsubseteq> b1_
  a2_ \<sqsubseteq> b2_

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. plus_const a1_ a2_ \<sqsubseteq> plus_const b1_ b2_

proof (state)
this:
  plus_const a1_ a2_ \<sqsubseteq> plus_const b1_ b2_

goal:
No subgoals!
definition "m_const x = (case x of Const _ \<Rightarrow> 1 | Any \<Rightarrow> 0)"

lemma measure_const:
  "(strict{(x::const,y). x \<sqsubseteq> y})^-1 \<subseteq> measure m_const"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (strict {(x, y). x \<sqsubseteq> y})\<inverse>
    \<subseteq> measure m_const

lemma measure_const_eq:
  "\<forall> x y::const. x \<sqsubseteq> y \<and> y \<sqsubseteq> x \<longrightarrow> m_const x = m_const y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x y.
       x \<sqsubseteq> y \<and> y \<sqsubseteq> x \<longrightarrow>
       m_const x = m_const y

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>c'. AI_const c = Some c'
